help:
Welcome to Team Deathmatch Arena The first ever Team Deathmatch based game for Multi Theft Auto: Deathmatch
You are automatically given a team to fight with, in some modes you may find pickups around the map which you can use to help your team in killing the opponent.
Your Objective: Kill the other team members to reach the score limit (Some maps dont have a score limit and is pure infanite killing)
